name: Stick Survivors Z
description:
Only recommended for gamers, if you want to test your "skills" try to survive as long as you can and defeat the final boss.

(Currently in development, the final result may be different from previous versions.)

--------------------------------------------------------------

Solo recomendado para gamers, si quieres poner a prueba tus "habilidades" intenta sobrevivir el mayor tiempo que puedas y derrota al jefe final.

(Actualmente en desarrollo, el resultado final puede ser diferente de versiones previas.)
